name: Mosquito got my Brain
description:
VR game designer working on “Mosquitonkhamun” immersive sim is being attacked by one intense mosquito, which makes him quite unstable through the week.

  • real live rhythm recordings (household + ardorugus)
  • a bit of voice narration
  • live mosquito rec (multi-timbre)
  • authentic 2D art based on a real Balkans house (+ room renovation ideas)
  • a portrait of Mosquitonkhamun to fumigate for

Press Space to play (whenever you feel dizzy). Though, give an ear to the narrative.
